location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.2098 of 1857 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, enclosing an extract of paragraph 31 from despatch no.16 of 1857 (folio 99) from the Court of Directors, dated 11 February 1857. The letter relates to the plunder of cargo from a shipwrecked vessel at Sharjah, and details the terms and level of compensation payable (585 dollars) by Shaikh Sooltan bin Suggur [Sultan bin Saqr] at the end of the pearl fishing season of 1856.
